Package com.heslington_hustle.game

Class HeslingtonHustle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • com.heslington_hustle.game.HeslingtonHustle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
    public class HeslingtonHustle
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    The HeslingtonHustle class represents the main game class for the Heslington Hustle game. It extends the Game class and manages the game's core components, screens, and state.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  HeslingtonHustle.GameState
      Enum representing the game's state.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Called when the game is paused, usually when it's not active or visible. Delegates the pause event to the active screen.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

      • changeScreen

        public void changeScreen​(int screen)
        Changes the current screen of the game based on the provided screen identifier. If the screen is null it creates a new one.
        Parameters:
        screen - the identifier of the screen to be changed to
